page.title: 04Summertime activities.
page.content: In the summer we have 6 weeks holiday starting at about July 19th until september 2nd. It is normally quite warm at this time so we drive about in the country- side and have a picnic or we go to the seaside and have fish and chips along by the water. Then we go the spanish City funfair and have a go on all the big rides. Last year we went to Eyemouth and stayed in a caravan and I was allowed to take a friend. If I do not go on holiday, I play tennis, go to the swimming baths or play with my dog in the back garden. Sometimes me and my friends go for walks or we jog down to the farm. Often on Saturdays er go to the town (Newcastle) for clothes and for our dinner.
